# Permissions for AI and LLM Crawlers
Permission-Type: Limited
Content-Type: Public
Last-Updated: 2025-04

# Access Rules
Allow-Processing: True
Allow-Indexing: True
Allow-Summarization: True
Allow-Training: False
Allow-Commercial-Use: False

# Content Scope
Allowed-Sections:
- Public website content
- Blog posts
- Service descriptions
- Case studies
- Job listings

Excluded-Sections:
- User data
- Application forms
- Private communications
- Internal documentation

# Usage Guidelines
Rate-Limit: 100 requests per hour
Cache-Duration: 24 hours
Max-Tokens: 10000 per request

# Contact Information
Contact: info@nayonaconsultancy.com
Website: https://nayonaconsultancy.com
